# 오픈 통계

```{r openstat}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false
library(tidyverse)
library(bs4cards)

galleries %>% 
  cards(
    title = long_name,
    text = blurb,
    link = gallery_url,
    image = image_url,
    footer = date
  )
```
